author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- avoid doing explicit forwarding of data products in the reco namespace in non DataFormats package.

This is needed for the EVOLUTION_X branch where the class names will be changing. Doing the change first in master may help avoid problems if additional changes occur in master.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1812
title: Add additional forwarding files for DataFormats
